pages.text: Novasteel Tools, much like $(l:mystium_tools)Mystium Tools,$(/l) carry Secondary Abilities, but these ones are souped-up to be even more powerful.

The $(item)Graphene Rod$() is used for some recipes, including as the handle for the Novasteel Tools.$(p)First, you will need to make Liquid Carbon. 1 Coal and $(9)1,000mB of Water$() in the Refinery will make 100mB Liquid Carbon. Then, you need $(b)Ground Diamond$() and 5,000mB Liquid Carbon with the Addition Attachment to make 1 Graphene Rod.
The Pickaxe's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to mine in a 5x5 pattern, allowing mass excavation in a quarter of the time.
The Shovel's $(3)Secondary Ability$() is to break dirt in a 3x3x5 pattern, allowing for even larger-scale terraforming.
The Sword's $(3)Secondary Ability$() is to harvest and bind an $(l:blocks/mob_farming#mobcrystal)Inert Mob Crystal,$() but it does it 2.5x more often than the Mystium Sword.
The Axe's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to chop down an entire tree at once while only breaking the bottom block, allowing forests to be felled quickly and swiftly.
The Hoe's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to generate $(item)Nova Farmland.$() It behaves just like $(l:items/mystium_tools#mystiumhoe)Mystium Farmland,$(/l) but does not get exhausted over time.
